name: Luke White Prototypes
description:
This package contains four small experimental prototypes made by Luke White.

The first, Changing Seasons, is a small changing picture that displays a tree going through the seasons.

The second, Troubling Gravity, is a game where the player has one control, click and hold to move, the player needs to reach the goal to win but failing to move for too long will result in a loss.

Vengeful Racer is the third prototype where the player actively seeks out the destruction of another racer, by crashing into them, they need to cause their competitor to crash 20 times within the allotted time to win, failure to do this or hitting an obstacle will result in a loss.

Dots To Blocks is a small platformer where the player draws dots on a piece of paper and shows the webcam to place blocks, this game's colour recognition has inconsistent results and issues should be expected.
